response.job_title: Profesor universitario asistente en Universidad Nacional de Colombia
response.summary:
Hello, my name is Jonathan Parra Santiago, I'm a chemical engineering interested in learning about anything and discovering the universe from the smallest things to the bigger ones.
Most of the time I have worked as a researcher in renewable energies and as a university professor in related areas such as thermodynamics.
I really love reading and writing. First of them is very important to discover the world and to found new lands. The second one is very important to share with the world your ideas and what you found by your investigations. By this way, I have written a lot of papers and some books in the research sector and at the same time I use to write some ideas such as fiction stories in my free time.
I have been working with international companies producing commercial agreements and working in the commercialization of products which gave me sales skills.
Some of my hobbies includes: reading in anyplace about anything, writing, drawing and painting when inspiration comes, computational simulation and 3D animation. I love learning languages (human languages and programming languages). I usually play some musical instruments like the piano and the accordion (as amateur and for relaxing). Most of the time I use my bicycle to move around of the city.
response.skills: Aspen HYSYS, AutoCAD, Aspen Plus, Planeamiento de proyectos, Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería de proyectos, Maya, ZBrush, Blender, COMSOL Multiphysics, Matlab, Autodesk Inventor, Dreamweaver, Photoshop, Corel Draw, Flash, FL Studio, 3D Studio Max, Fotografía
